generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, including a curved section and a crosswalk.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right edge of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including multi-story residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street and in the background, providing greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast with clouds.
- person: A person can be seen sitting inside the tram on the left side of the image.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver car and a dark-colored car.
- truck: A white truck is visible parked or driving on the street in the background.
- bus: A green and white tram (a type of bus) is prominently featured on the left side of the image.
- traffic sign: A "30" speed limit sign and a pedestrian crossing sign are visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs along the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, mounted on poles.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible in the background, particularly on the hillside behind the trees.
